scripts.text:
IF OBJECT_ID('loga.dataflow') IS NOT NULL
DROP TABLE loga.dataflow;
CREATE TABLE loga.dataflow(ProductID INTEGER,Name VARCHAR(MAX),ProductNumber VARCHAR(MAX),Color VARCHAR(MAX),StandardCost DECIMAL(10,4),ListPrice DECIMAL(10,4),  
Size VARCHAR(MAX),Weight DECIMAL(10,2),
ProductCategoryID INTEGER,ProductModelID INTEGER,SellStartDate INTEGER, 
SellEndDate VARCHAR(MAX),ThumbNailPhoto BINARY,   
ThumbnailPhotoFileName VARCHAR(MAX),
rowguid VARCHAR(MAX),
ModifiedDate TIMESTAMP,
rankbyprice BIGINT,
SurrogateId BIGINT)

DECLARE @piple


CREATE TABLE Monitor_Pipeline 
( 
ID INT IDENTITY(1,1) 

,	PipelineName VARCHAR(255) 

,	Run_Status VARCHAR(255) 

,	Pipeline_trigger_time DATETIME 

); 

INSERT INTO Monitor_Pipeline(PipelineName,Run_Status,Pipeline_trigger_time) VALUES(@PipelineName,'Success',@PipelineTime)
